title: Lab Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN)
Interview Descriptions: It was a great interview, smooth and easy to schedule! The employer asked great questions as well. Very comfortable environment. Depending which department you apply for also contributes to what type of interview it is.
Interview Questions: What brings you to wanting a job at etsu?

title: Instructional Designer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at East Tennessee State
Interview Descriptions: Good job. Nice people. Very interesting people who were well informed and showed passion in the company and the team that support it. Definitely would recommend them to my family or friends who might be looking for work there.
Interview Questions: What do you want from work?

title: Tutor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at East Tennessee State
Interview Descriptions: The interview was fairly basic and asked general interview questions. I was not a tutor for the CFAA, it was for a federal work study within ETSU called America Reads. So please disregard if you are reading this in preparation of an interview for a tutor position through the library. I was interviewed by a graduate student as well, rather than the head of the program.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (New York, NY) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: First had to finish an online application process by the end of March.  I was interviewed for graduate Assistantship for Masters in Chemistry program. The interview was done through WhatsApp. Took not more than 15 minutes.
Interview Questions:
My favorite subject during my undergraduate study.
What is distillation
How to separate water and alcohol

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at East Tennessee State
Interview Descriptions: Took a while to get an interview, but once interviewed process moved quickly.  There was good communication during the process where there could be.  Would recommend employer.  Went in for an initial interview and was invited back for second interview.  Offer came within a week or so.
Interview Questions: Why are interested in this position?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at East Tennessee State
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very informal; I met with a few people in the department. Everyone was very nice and friendly. I felt very comfortable with everyone and felt I could be myself at all times. It was nice!
Interview Questions: What kind of environment do you thrive in?

title: Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Laid back and conversational. They ask you about your experience and several high-level questions. They want to see your over all knowledge base, as well as your experience. It more of a show-case of your knowledge then a test.
Interview Questions: Explain why you would use JAVA over C#.

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions:
Career Goals, Motivation, Salary expectations, relocation, Tell me about yourself.
What is your greatest strength?
What is your greatest weakness?
What makes you unique?
Tell me about something that's not on your resume.
How will your greatest strength help you perform?
How do you handle failure?
How do you handle success?
Do you consider yourself successful? Why?
How do you handle stress and pressure?
How would you describe yourself?
Describe a typical work week.
Are you nice?
Are you willing to fail?
Are you willing to relocate?
Describe your work ethic.
Describe your work style.
Do you work well with other people?
Do you take work home with you?
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this position?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: They accepted to interview me on Skype as I was out of the country. I interviewed with the Vice President, he was very nice and the interview was very chill. got offered the job a week later.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your experience

title: Educational Advisor (TRIO) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions:
I applied and received a request for an interview about a month later. It was a panel with three people. They took turns asking questions. Also, I was given an "interview task" to complete prior to the interview. 
I was told that the process would take a few weeks and that I would hear something either way. It has now been over a month and I have emailed 2/3 of the people who interviewed me- neither one responded. Honestly, that was pretty disappointing because I genuinely thought they had more professionalism than that.
Interview Questions: How would you approach a tutor who is consistently late and often  doesn't stay for the full hour as required?

title: Video Scout Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Hudson, NC) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: I received a call from one of the directors of the business and they asked me about my knowledge and background in football. They also wanted to know why I got into the sport.
Interview Questions: Why do you want a career in sports, specifically football?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: I had a conference interview with four people from hiring department. They were very kind and had me sit at the end of the table and answer questions. They also went over the pay and benefits they were offering and asked if I agreed.
Interview Questions: Former job experience?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was casual process, I was a new student so I was nervous. however, ETSU made me feel at ease and comfortable. The interview was simple and to the point.
Interview Questions: Where I see myself in the future

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: The process was basically about telling the interviewer about my self and my on the job experience, questions were also asked about my background on conducting research. The interview was conducted in a relaxed mood as I have been corresponding with the faculties prior to the interview date. I had to be there ahead of time as punctuality goes a long way in creating a great impression about you to your prospective employer.
Interview Questions: I was asked about my self and my on the job experience, questions were also asked about my background on conducting research.

title: Adjunct Marketing Faculty Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: I made a phone call to the College of Business and Technology Chairperson. I personally sold myself  and asked to teach for ETSU when I graduated. He asked me to send my professional portfolio. I complied sending electronically. I made another phone call in a couple of two weeks. We had conversation. He agreed to let me teach post graduation. I would be assigned either Marketing Principles, Fundamentals of Distribution, or Consumer Behavior. I met in March 2015 on campus. This was a very casual yet highly professional believing and affirming of  my credentialing meeting. He gave me a copy of a syllabus and a Marketing textbook. As soon as I graduated May 2015 on a Saturday, I started course development of Marketing Principles on campus.
Interview Questions: When will my degree be completed?

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: It is a panel interview and it is standard to most interviews. You will meet with a selected panel of available managers from HR, office management, and faculty. The questions are standard and the same that you would expect.
Interview Questions: standard questions

title: University Relations Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was recommended to the director of marketing for the position. We met in her office and talked about my previous works, my future goals and what I would like to work on while I was there and when I was available to work. The whole conversation only lasted about 8 minutes but it was pleasant.
Interview Questions: Where would you like to work, ideally?

title: Gift Processor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Jul 2014
Interview Descriptions: This was an internal interview, and consisted of the original application and a single interview. Of course, I had been working there as a temp for years, so I was already known. The interview consisted of myself and a panel of supervisors in the suite. Each supervisor took turns asking me questions about myself and how I would handle things.
Interview Questions: Do you think you would apply to be the supervisor of the unit if you were given the opportunity?

title: Photographer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very simple. asked basic questions and wanted to see sample work. Asked if I had time to devote to the organization several times. The editor was friendly and helpful. The whole environment was comfortable and I felt like I could be myself.
Interview Questions: What is your availability?

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions: After applying to the university, I looked for a teaching/research position. The university application was a normal process. Then I contacted my department to talk to them about getting a teaching position. There was no real interview process that I can recall
Interview Questions: I cannot remember any specific question, it seemed that most of the graduate students were assistants.

title: Librarian Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN) in Dec 2009
Interview Descriptions: Generally professional but did not feel like I fit the institution so would have seriously considered offer but maydeclined based on additional information.
Interview Questions: N/A

Application Type: I interviewed at East Tennessee State (Johnson City, TN)
Interview Descriptions: It was a great interview, smooth and easy to schedule! The employer asked great questions as well. Very comfortable environment. Depending which department you apply for also contributes to what type of interview it is.
